text: Brittany Nicole Waddell (known by her stage name, Britt Nicole; born August 2, 1984) is an American singer. She sings Christian pop music. Her song "Gold" was released in late 2012. Britt was born in Charlotte, North Carolina. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Follow the Call (2003) * Say It (2007) * The Lost Get Found (2009) * Gold (2012) * Britt Nicole (2016) ==References== Category:Entertainers from Charlotte, North Carolina Category:Christian music singers Category:1984 births Category:Living people
title: Britt Nicole
